metadata.title: CVE-2016-7427 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
The broadcast mode replay prevention functionality in ntpd in NTP before4.2.8p9 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (rejectbroadcast mode packets) via a crafted broadcast mode packet.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7427` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ntp - 1:4.2.6.p5+dfsg-3ubuntu2.14.04.11
ntpdate - 1:4.2.6.p5+dfsg-3ubuntu2.14.04.11
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ntp package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:4.2.6.p5+dfsg-3ubuntu2.14.04.11').
